name: <Number>.toBytesString
desc: Converts a number to a formatted bytes sting using KiB, MiB, etc.

variants.desc: Converts the Number to a formatted String with suitable unit.

param.name: digits
param.desc: The maximum number of significant digits to show (default: 2)

param.name: locale
param.desc: A valid locale indicator to specifiy how the number should be formatted (default: 'en-US')
